arts.ttl: Werder Bremen maintain impressive away form with win against St. Pauli
arts.sum: Derrick Köhn and Marvin Ducksch netted a goal in each half as Werder Bremen climbed up to seventh spot in the standings following a fifth win on the road this term, with St. Pauli succumbing at the Millerntor-Stadion. Pauli's Oladapo Afolayan found himself under constant pressure, being pressed 26 times during the match, the highest of any player on the pitch.

arts.ttl: Clinical Werder punish St. Pauli at Millerntor
arts.sum: Ruthless Werder Bremen claimed three points against St. Pauli thanks to goals from Derrick Köhn and Marvin Ducksch.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Werder Bremen preview: Hosts aiming for back-to-back home wins
arts.sum: St. Pauli will have the chance to claim back-to-back home wins when they face Werder Bremen on Saturday.
